exampleChanged.title: Save changes to example project?
exampleChanged.text: You've made changes to an example project. You can discard these changes, or save them as a new project.

deleteProject.title: Delete project?
deleteProject.text: Do you really want to delete this project and all associated files? This action cannot be undone.

save_as.title: Save project as ...
save_as.text: Enter a name for this project.

create_project.title: Create a new project
create_project.text: Choose what kind of project you would like to create:
create_project.text_2: Enter the name of your new project:

create_file.title: Create a new file
create_file.text: Enter the name of the new file, with its extension (only files with extensions .cpp, .c or .S will be compiled).

delete_file.title: Delete this file
delete_file.text: Do you want to delete the file you're currently working on? (This can't be undone.)

rename_file.title: Rename this file
rename_file.text: Enter the new name of this file, with its extension (only files with extensions .cpp, .c or .S will be compiled).

restore_defaults.title: Restore default settings?
restore_defaults.text: This will restore the Bela default settings, overwriting all your changes. This can't be undone!

about_bela.title: About Bela
about_bela.text: Bela is an open source project, and is a product of the Augmented Instruments Laboratory at Queen Mary University of London, and Augmented Instruments Ltd. For more information, visit http://bela.io

shutdown.title: Shut down Bela?
shutdown.text: Are you sure you wish to continue? Bela will shutdown gracefully, and the IDE will disconnect.

update.title: Update Bela
update.text: If you've downloaded the update as a zip file, upload it here. (Otherwise, visit bela.io/update to download the latest version.)
